Berapa lama proses pengerjaan sebuah web: How long does it take to create a website?
Tergantung kompleksitas. Untuk paket Sta: It depends on the complexity. For the Start/Pro package, it usually takes around 7-14 working days after we receive all the materials (text, images). For the Custom package, the time will be adjusted to the scope of the project.
Apakah harga sudah termasuk domain dan h: Does the price include domain and hosting?
Betul! Setiap paket sudah termasuk grati: That's right! Every package includes a free domain (.com) and hosting for the first year, as well as SSL for security. You don't have to worry about technical matters at the beginning.
Apakah ada garansi setelah website jadi?: Is there a warranty after the website is finished?
Tentu. Kami memberikan garansi maintenan: Of course. We provide a maintenance guarantee for 1-2 months (depending on the package) to ensure the website runs smoothly and is free of technical errors after launching.
Apakah saya bisa mengelola konten websit: Can I manage the website content myself later?
Sangat bisa! Kami membangun website di a: Absolutely! We build websites on a user-friendly platform (CMS). We will provide a short guide so you can easily update content such as text, images, or blog articles.
Sistemnya fleksibel. Biasanya 50% DP (Do: The system is flexible. Usually 50% DP (Down Payment) at the beginning as a down payment, and the remaining 50% after the website is finished and ready to go online (before account handover).
